roleset.name: make speechless with shock
roleset.note: DUMBFOUND-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from dumbfound.01-v)

role.descr: Manner or Instrument if separate from arg 0

example.name: Passive
example.text: Mary-1 was dumbfounded *-1 by the beauty of the ballet.
example.arg: by the beauty of the ballet

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: The dancers dumbfounded Mary with the beauty of their movements.
example.arg: with the beauty of their movements
